page.title: 12Lumberg Electronics
page.content: {Lumberg}is situated in Tubbs Lane, Woolton Hill.It is an example of a new industry as it is an electronic company. Lumberg came to Woolton Hill in 1980, before that it was based in London. Lumberg deals in eletronics components which are made in Germany.These are exported to this country and Lumbergs sell them to companies all over Great Britain. They employ three people: a salesman, a computer operator and a secretary. They have offices in France and Holland and are a very successful company.
